Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black (fired reddish brown) below; traces of added white and added red bands near top and again near bottom of sherd; exterior: brown line on top of rim; frieze of blanks filled with rectangles around rim above dilute line; reserved below; at bottom, on handle zone, part of motif differing from the maeander immediately to the left on the joining sherd 1888,0601.188a; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1148) (phase 2)
